dcterms:description: A subset of the widely used large-scale Common Voice dataset is used to evaluate the proposed methods, consisting of 10 languages pre-trained by Whisper and 10 new languages, with each language containing a 10 hours train set, a 1 hour validation set, and a 1 hour test set.
dcterms:title: Common Voice
